mapper.select: select company_id, company_full_name FROM company where company_id=#{company_id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company (company_full_name, company_name, company_size, contact, contact_phone, contact_position, province_code, province_name, city_code, city_name, county_code, county_name, address, company_profile, company_business_license, company_logo, company_pic) VALUES (#{company_full_name}, #{company_name}, #{company_size}, #{contact}, #{contact_phone}, #{contact_position}, #{province_code}, #{province_name}, #{city_code}, #{city_name}, #{county_code}, #{county_name}, #{address}, #{company_profile}, #{company_business_license}, #{company_logo}, #{company_pic});
